mapper.sql: ID, UNIT_NAME, REGISTER_NUMBER, SOFTWARE_NAME, COPYRIGHT_OWNER, VERSION_NUMBER, RECORD_DATE, DEVELOP_FINISH_DATE, SOFTWARE_INTRO, ENTRY_PEOPLE, ENTRY_TIME, NOTES, ACCESSORY_UPLOAD, DELETED, create_date, create_user update_date, update_user
mapper.select:
select
from computer_software where id = #{id} and deleted != '1'
mapper.update: update computer_software set deleted = '1' where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into computer_software ( ID, UNIT_NAME, REGISTER_NUMBER, SOFTWARE_NAME, COPYRIGHT_OWNER, VERSION_NUMBER, RECORD_DATE, DEVELOP_FINISH_DATE, SOFTWARE_INTRO, ENTRY_PEOPLE, ENTRY_TIME, NOTES, ACCESSORY_UPLOAD, DELETED, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user ) values ( #{id}, #{unitName}, #{registerNumber}, #{softwareName}, #{copyrightOwner}, #{versionNumber}, #{recordDate}, #{developFinishDate}, #{softwareIntro}, #{entryPeople}, #{entryTime}, #{notes}, #{accessoryUpload}, #{deleted}, #{createDate}, #{creator}, #{updateDate}, #{updator} )
mapper.update:
update computer_software
UNIT_NAME = #{UNIT_NAME},
REGISTER_NUMBER = #{REGISTER_NUMBER},
SOFTWARE_NAME = #{SOFTWARE_NAME},
COPYRIGHT_OWNER = #{COPYRIGHT_OWNER},
VERSION_NUMBER = #{VERSION_NUMBER},
RECORD_DATE = #{RECORD_DATE},
DEVELOP_FINISH_DATE = #{DEVELOP_FINISH_DATE},
SOFTWARE_INTRO = #{SOFTWARE_INTRO},
ENTRY_PEOPLE = #{ENTRY_PEOPLE},
ENTRY_TIME = #{ENTRY_TIME},
NOTES = #{NOTES},
ACCESSORY_UPLOAD = #{ACCESSORY_UPLOAD},
update_date = #{updateDate},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{id}
